actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the licensing of hydroelectric projects on the Middle Snake River below Hells Canyon Dam at any time before September 30, 1978.

summary.text: Prohibits the licensing of hydroelectric projects on the Middle Snake River below Hells Canyon Dam at any time before September 30, 1978. Provides that this act does not apply to applications pending before the Federal Power Commission before the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the licensing of hydroelectric projects on the Middle Snake River below Hells Canyon Dam at any time before September 30, 1978.
